textAfterTable: Profile Aberdeen Global - Asian Local Currency Short Duration Bond Fund is a SICAV incorporated in Luxembourg. The objective of the Fund is long-term total return. The Fund invests at least two-thirds of it's assets in debt and debt-related securities issued by governments, supranational institutions or government-related bodies that are domiciled in Asian countries.
